description: Dashboard for dynamic display of the SPPCheck Results

panels.description:
95% Percentille / last 24h of each component memory usage
Max root storage usage  / last 24h of Server and vSnap
panels.title: SPP Catalog Space

panels.description: Duration of the last execution of selected jobs
panels.title: Housekeeping-Job Durations

targets.query: SELECT max("%idle") *-1 + 100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "COMMAND"

panels.description:
This panel shows how much the dela did increase, leaving out going down again.
Good for noticing errors, even if they disappeared

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("constant" = 'True')) where time >= now() - 2d
SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("hourly" = 'True')) where time >= now() - 2d
SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("daily" = 'True')) where time >= now() - 2d
SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("all" = 'True')) where time >= now() - 2d

SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("daily" != 'True' AND "constant" != 'True' AND "all" != 'True' AND "hourly" != 'True')) GROUP BY time(1d)

panels.title: SPPmon Collection Errors delta(48h)

targets.query: SELECT PERCENTILE( *, 90) FROM (SELECT sum("%CPU") FROM "rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE $timeFilter AND  ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER')  GROUP BY time(1s), "COMMAND") GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND"
SELECT PERCENTILE( *, 90) FROM (SELECT sum("%MEM") FROM "rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE $timeFilter AND  ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER')  GROUP BY time(1s), "COMMAND") GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND"

panels.description:
Sum of replicated bytes (VM) within the last 24h
Sum of transferred bytes (VM) within the last 24h
Sum of transferred bytes (Office365) within the last 24h
panels.title: Additional Statistics (Last 24h)

alert.message: CPU and or Memory consumption is exceeding the defined alerting threshold on the IBM Spectrum Protect Plus server.  If the usage continues above the threshold, confirm that the SPP server configuration meets the blueprint CPU and Memory requirements.  Review the charts showing resource consumption by process for further insight into which server components are using the most resources.
alert.name: CPU / RAM SPP-Server (REST) alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("memoryUtil") *100 FROM "cpuram" WHERE ("time" < 1596461046000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

alert.message: The per process threshold for CPU consumption on the IBM Spectrum Protect Plus server is being exceeded for one or more processes.  Continue to monitor to see if this is temporary or ongoing.  If the overall CPU consumption of the SPP server is also being conceded then it may be necessary to expand the CPU allocation of the SPP server.
alert.name: SPP-Server Processes CPU Usage (sshcmd: top) alert

panels.description:
Selected Processes monitored by top command
"java", "mongo", "beam.smp".
Querie calcualted due an inner querie to filter out the PID. Simple "mean" would result in a falsly low result

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT mean("%CPU") FROM "rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND", "PID" fill(none)) GROUP BY  "COMMAND", time($interval) FILL(none)

panels.title: SPP-Server Processes CPU Usage (sshcmd: top)

alert.message: CPU consumption has exceeded the defined alert threshold on one or more systems (SPP server, vSnap server, or VADP proxy).  If the threshold continues to be exceeded, additional CPU resource may need to be allocated to the system.
alert.name: Component CPU (sshcmd: MP-ssh) alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("%idle") *-1 + 100 FROM "server_mpstat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

alert.message: Memory consumption has exceeded the defined alert threshold on one or more systems (SPP server, vSnap server, or VADP proxy).  If the threshold continues to be exceeded, additional memory may need to be allocated to the system.
alert.name: RAM by Component Used (sshcmd: free) alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("used")  / mean(total) FROM "ssh_free_cmd" WHERE ("name" = 'Mem') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "ssh_type" fill(none)

alert.message: The per process threshold for memory consumption on the IBM Spectrum Protect Plus server is being exceeded for one or more processes.  Continue to monitor to see if this is temporary or ongoing.  If the overall memory consumption of the SPP server is also being conceded then it may be necessary to expand the memory allocation of the SPP server.
alert.name: SPP-Server Processes RAM Usage (sshcmd: top) alert

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT mean("%MEM") FROM "rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND", "PID" fill(none)) GROUP BY  "COMMAND", time($interval) FILL(none)

panels.description:
Selected Processes monitored by top command
"java", "mongo", "beam.smp"

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT mean("MEM_ABS") FROM "rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND", "PID" fill(none)) GROUP BY  "COMMAND", time($interval) FILL(none)

panels.title: SPP-Server Processes RAM Usage (sshcmd: top)

alert.message:
Used storage space for one or more of the catalogs on the IBM Spectrum Protect Plus server has exceeded the alerting threshold.  The storage capacity for the file system holding the catalog can be increased following a procedure available in the SPP documentation.

Configuration catalog = /data
Recovery catalog = /data2
File catalog = /data3
alert.name: SPP-Server File System alert

alert.message: The space used in the root file system in the specified server(s) is exceeding the defined alert threshold.  If the file system fills to 100%, a system outage may occur.  Unnecessary files in the root file system need to be cleaned up and/or the capacity of the root file system needs to be increased.
alert.name: Storage Usage (Server & vSnap) alert

targets.query: SELECT "size_free" FROM "vsnap_pools" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "size_free" FROM "vsnap_pools" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"

alert.message: The elapsed time for the maintenance job on the IBM Spectrum Protect Plus server has exceeded the defined alert threshold.  The maintenance job is responsible for removing snapshots that have exceeded the retention specified in SLA policies, and needs to complete on a regular interval in order to maintain sufficient vSnap available storage.
alert.name: Maintenance Job Duration alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("duration")  / 1000 FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Maintenance') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"

alert.message: The elapsed time for one or more VMware backup or replication jobs has exceeded the defined alerting threshold.
alert.name: VMware Protection Job Durations alert

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"
SELECT "duration" FROM "jobs" WHERE ("jobName" = 'Hypervisor Inventory') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "jobName"

SELECT first("percent") AS "Last Percent", first("numTasks") AS "Last numTasks", first("duration") AS "Last Duration", count("duration") AS "Times of Failure / 14 Days" FROM "rp_days_90"."jobs" WHERE ("status" != 'COMPLETED') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "status", "jobName", "jobId"
SELECT "vmCountBySLA" AS $tag_slaName FROM "slaStats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "slaName"
SELECT min("commited") FROM "vms" WHERE ("commited" != 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

alert.message: The backup success rate for VMware virtual disks has dropped below the defined alerting threshold.  Check details of job logs on the IBM Spectrum Protect Plus server for details on the errors causing the failures.
alert.name: VM's Backup Sucess rate alert

targets.query: SELECT count("TotalVMDKs") -sum(protectedVMDKs) FROM "rp_days_14"."vmBackupSummary" WHERE ("status" = 'failed' AND "messageId" = 'CTGGA2384') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("protectedVMDKs") / sum(TotalVMDKs) FROM "rp_days_14"."vmBackupSummary" WHERE ("status" = 'complete' OR "status" = 'partial' OR "status" = 'failed' AND "messageId" = 'CTGGA2384') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(none)
SELECT "TotalVMDKs" - protectedVMDKs FROM "vmBackupSummary" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: By Proxy: VM Backup Transferred Bytes
By VSnap: VM Backup Transferred Bytes
By Type: VM Backup Transferred Bytes

panels.description: Selects mean of each unique storage, sums up to total per site

targets.query: SELECT sum(used_mean) FROM (SELECT mean("used") AS "used_mean" FROM "rp_days_14"."storages" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "siteName", "storageId") GROUP BY  time($__interval), "siteName" fill(none)

panels.title: Site Storage Used (by capacity)

alert.message: The percentage of used storage on one or more vSnap servers has exceeded the alerting threshold.  Once the vSnap reaches the used capacity defined as its error threshold, backup failures may result.  Consult SPP documentation for information on how to expand the storage capacity of a vSnap server.
alert.name: vSnap storage space utilization alert

alert.message: The used percentage of CPU and/or memory has exceeded the alerting threshold for one of more vSnap servers.
alert.name: VSnap CPU & RAM Health alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)

alert.message: The percentage of used CPU and/or Memory has exceeded the defined alerting threshold for one or more VADP proxy servers.
alert.name: VADP CPU & RAM Health alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)

alert.message: The percentage of used CPU and/or Memory has exceeded the defined alerting threshold for one or more M365 cloud proxy servers.
alert.name: Cloudproxy CPU & RAM Health alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("%idle") *-1+100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE ("ssh_type" = 'VADP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostName", "host" fill(none)

panels.description: Displays the final change rate of errors which occured, going to stay at 0 if all is on a normal "error"-level
panels.title: SPPmon Collection Error delta (48h)

targets.query: SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)

alert.message: SPPMON has encountered errors performing one or more data collections.
alert.name: SPPmon Collection Errors delta alert

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE ("daily" = 'True') AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_difference(difference("errorCount")) FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE ("all" = 'True') AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE ("constant" = 'True') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT last("errorCount") FROM "rp_days_14"."sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "spp_build", "spp_version", "sppmon_version", "influxdb_version" ORDER BY time DESC

alert.message: The duration of one or more SPPMON queries has exceeded the defined alerting threshold.
alert.name: SPPMON Runtime Duration alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(12h)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "influx_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m), "tableName"
SELECT mean("duration_ms")  / (mean(item_count)/1000) FROM "influx_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "tableName"
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "influx_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m), "tableName"

title: SPPCheck for IBM Spectrum Protect Plus
